attributes.action: Addition to terrorist offences to include bribery and threats from groups
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any group found to attempt bribery with removal of services due to government policy should be charged under the terrorism act.

This is in reference to the reprehensible actions of the Catholic church which is threatening the removal of co-operation with the Government over schools, charity programmes and adoption agencies if the new sexual orientation regulations go ahead.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
